dc_title_s: A chart exhibiting the actual and comparative size of each country, nation, or kingdom : its population as a whole and to a square mile : also the different states of society, forms of government, religion &c.
dc_description_s: World map showing religion, government, races of men and state of society. At foot of title: O. Pelton Engraver. Possibly from: An atlas to accompany the productive geography / Roswell Chamberlain Smith. Philadelphia : W. Marshall, [1837], c1835. Includes a table of distances between the chief towns or capitals of the several states also between these towns and Washington the capital of the United States. Insets: Oceanica pop. 20m. -- New Holland.
